summary:
13+ years' experience in risk, strategy, and governance in diverse industries: financial institutions, non-profit, media/technology, healthcare, emergency services, and municipal government.

Passionate about supporting global social enterprises through strategy, governance, and risk / operations advisory.

As Manager,  Enterprise Business Continuity Management (May 2014 - Oct 2017):

• As SME and relationship manager, provided independent oversight, advisory, and effective challenge to Commerical and Retail banking on operational risk compliance, audit, and risk exposures via operational risk mechanisms, e.g., Initiative Assessment programs, Risk and Control Self Assessments, and Issues management process.
